message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm asking for $12,000. I think it's a fair price considering what you'll gain from it.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not comfortable with the initial offer of $12,000. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This reflects the product's true worth.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
